name: LEGO DC Super Heroes Universe
description: The interconnected universe of direct-to-video animated films featuring the LEGO versions of DC characters. Known for its family-friendly humor and action, this continuity is separate from the theatrical LEGO movies.

media.name: Lego Batman the Movie: DC Super Heroes Unite
media.timeline_note: This film is an adaptation of the 'Lego Batman 2: DC Super Heroes' video game and serves as the starting point for this universe.
